A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: They introduce a very cool idea for a plot\, then just ignore it for the whole movie. Instead of copying one of the episodes 3-6\, they just take random bits of each and string together a sequence of \"consequence\" that is in no way related to the main plot point they establish. It is filled to the brim with Deus ex machina\, which makes the entire thing boring. They waste good characters in boring and useless roles. It feels like the creators were in a capitalist frenzy and craved a new starwars movie to sell products.
